name: Cycle of Violence
description:
MIND THE VOLUME WHEN PLAYING IN BROWSER! 
I did not have time to implement sound settings during the jam!

In Cycle of Violence you play as a many-armed gunslinger battling their way through a skeleton-infested town!
Go for the high score and progress by safely finding the exit of each level.

You can carry up to 8 guns, but being hit by an enemy attack will slap one of them out of your hands.
Be careful, if you suffer an attack while unarmed it's game over!

Controls:

WASDMovementSpacebarJumpLeft Mouse ButtonShoot currently cycled gun
Right Mouse ButtonAimAim + Left Mouse ButtonShoot guns simultaneously

Tip: The combo multiplier increases to x3 after the 6th defeated enemy, and to x4 after the 9th defeated enemy.

This game is a submission to Kenney Jam 2021.
Thanks for taking a look!
